title: Anzac Day: World War 1 (Yrs 9-11)
brief_description: Presented by Richard Morecroft, this program looks at empire building alliances and events which led to the start of World War I. It presents the romance of war, life and death at Gallipoli and Australian campaigns in the Sinai desert and in Europe.
